snippet: Shops in SoHo have reported encounters, some violent, with a group of four teenagers and a “mother figure” who pretend to try on clothes, then steal them off the racks.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes seeming family group that has been entering boutiques in Manhattan's SoHo neighborhood and stealing thousands of dollars of high-end goods by simply stuffing them into shopping bags and running out.
lead_paragraph: Shops in SoHo have reported encounters, some violent, with a group of four teenagers and a “mother figure” who pretend to try on clothes, then steal them off the racks.

headline.seo: A Familial Unit Visits Boutiques, Looking for New Jeans
headline.main: A Seemingly Familial Unit Visits Boutiques, Looking for New Jeans
headline.print_headline: A Seemingly Familial Unit Visits Boutiques, Looking for New Jeans
